description: Try our easy to follow Pulled Pork Rolls with Apple Slaw recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pulled Pork Rolls with Apple Slaw
name: Pulled Pork Rolls with Apple Slaw Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 225 g sachet smoky chipotle cooking sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Combine crème fraîche, vinegar and mustard in a bowl. Add coleslaw, apple and spring onion and toss to combine. To serve, top roll bases with coleslaw, pork and roll lids.
